LanguageData.PsyfocusDesc: Mana is the naturally occuring energy harnessed by mages that allows them to perform magical feats. Mages need to meditate and reflect on spellcasting to increase their mana.\n\nHigher levels of mana permit higher-level powers, but also increase the rate of mana dissipation
LanguageData.DesiredPsyfocusDesc: Click to set desired mana level.
LanguageData.LetterTextLinkingRitualCompleted: {PAWN_labelShort} has completed the linking ritual with {LINKABLE_labelShort}.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} now has an heightened mana level, permitting the use of new magical spells.
LanguageData.RitualTargetAnimaTreeMustBeCapableOfNatu: Must be a colonist with the natural meditation focus type who is below maximum attunement level.
LanguageData.RitualTargetAnimaTreeMustBePsychicallySe: Must not be cut off from magic.
LanguageData.PawnTooltipPsychicEntropyDesc: Arcane load increases after using a spell. Surpassing the normal limit may cause a mana overload lasting days.\n\nArcane load dissipates naturally over time. This process can be accelerated by wearing arcanium apparel or being in pain.
LanguageData.PawnTooltipPsychicEntropyLimit: Toggle arcane load limiter. Exceeding your arcane load limit may cause a mana overload lasting days. It won't cause permanent damage.

LanguageData.SkillNeurotrainerDescription: An enchanted tome which when read allows the reader to practice a skill in their own mind, setting up a perfect training room and dialating time. This allows them to spend many days practicing this skill from their perspective despite only appearing to take a moment to any on-lookers.\n\nAs the power of the tome fades it crumbles into useless dust.
